DOC.brief_summary: Carry out the cost-effectiveness analysis of rosiglitazone on a population in line with the rosiglitazone license and using UK costs
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Duration of Oral Combination Therapy in Type 2 Diabetes, Prior to the Initiation of Insulin in the UK
DOC.criteria: Rosiglitazone Type II Diabetes studies Studies without the required outcome
